summary: Texas State University (TXST) is a large public research university in San Marcos, Texas, with a second campus in Round Rock. Founded in 1899, it now has over 40,000 students and offers more than 200 degree programs. The university is known for its research, with over $140 million spent in 2023. It's also famous for being the alma mater of U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson. Texas State's sports teams, the Bobcats, compete in NCAA Division I. The main campus sits on 507 acres along the San Marcos River.
title: Texas State University
